      • deriveKeyArgon2

        public byte[] deriveKeyArgon2(byte[] passwd,
                              byte[] salt)
        Derive a key from password using Argon2 password hashing scheme. Argon2 is added in libsodium 1.0.9
        Parameters:
        passwd - Password bytes
        salt - Salt bytes. Length must be sodium().crypto_pwhash_saltbytes()
        Returns:
        bytes of generated key
        See Also:
        https://download.libsodium.org/doc/password_hashing/the_argon2i_function.html
